name: Mobile-site-basic
tagline: This is a template for a basic mobile website. HTML, CSS, Jquery Mobile.
body: ![qr Code](https://raw.github.com/vajradog/mobile-site-basic/master/assets/qr.png)Use the QR code for a working demo. I hope this template gives a jumpstart in developing your mobile website. Good Luck and Have Fun. Use "data-theme" to change themes instantly or use the lovely Jquerymobile Themeroller. Below are some screenshots that may help you visualise your project. ![Screenshot](https://github.com/vajradog/mobile-site-basic/raw/master/assets/photo%201.PNG?raw=true) ![Screenshot 2](https://github.com/vajradog/mobile-site-basic/raw/master/assets/photo%202.PNG?raw=true) ![Screenshot 3](https://github.com/vajradog/mobile-site-basic/raw/master/assets/photo%203.PNG?raw=true) ![Screenshot 3](https://github.com/vajradog/mobile-site-basic/raw/master/assets/photo%204.PNG?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
